Draw text on entity
On this page
Draw text on entity
This will draw text centered on the entity stored in the given variable. You can move the text up or down by setting the 'Offset', positive numbers will move it up and negative down.
Parameters
â€‹

Text (text)
Offset (text)
Font (font)
